Class TableController

java.lang.Object
com.tablr.controller.TableController
public class TableController extends Object
Manages tables by allowing creation, deletion, retrieval, and renaming.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    TableController()
    Constructs a new TableController with an empty list of tables.

    • renameTable

      public void renameTable(int tableId, String userInput)
      Renames a table with the given id, only if valid.
      Parameters:
      tableId - The id of the table to rename.
      userInput - The new name for the table.
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is invalid.
      IllegalArgumentException - if the name is empty or already exists.

    • tryToggleAllowsBlank

      public boolean tryToggleAllowsBlank(int tableId, int columnId, boolean newAllowsBlank)
      Tries to update the allowsBlank property of a column in the specified table.
      Parameters:
      tableId - | The ID of the table containing the column.
      columnId - | The ID of the column to be updated.
      newAllowsBlank - | The new value for the allowsBlank property.
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful; false if it was blocked due to invalid blank values.
